contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox musical artist |name = Uff! |image = |image_size= |caption = |background = group_or_band |alias = |origin = [[Venezuela]] |instrument = |genre = [[Pop music|Pop]] |occupation = |years_active = |label = |associated_acts = |website = |current_members = Alexander Gomes <br /> Fabio Melannitto <br /> Rawy Mattar <br /> Jean Ducournau <br /> Jose Luis Graterol <br /> Marcos Causa |past_members = }} '''Uff!''' was the name of a [[Venezuela]]n [[boy band]]. Molded in the way that [[Menudo (band)|Menudo]], [[Los Chicos]] and [[Los Chamos]] were, but with some members who physically resembled members of [[No Authority]], [[Backstreet Boys]] and [[Hanson (band)|Hanson]], the group enjoyed wide popularity in Venezuela during the late 1990s. The group first appeared on [[Venevision]]'s show ''[[Sabado Sensacional]]'', before a national audience, in 1992. ''Uff!'' was composed of:<ref>[http://cluboficialconuff.galeon.com/index.html Club Oficial Uff website - biographies]</ref> -Alexander Gomes - born 2 October 1980 in [[Caracas]] -Fabio Melannitto - born 3 February 1979 in Caracas -Rawy Mattar - born 14 August 1980 in Caracas -Jean Ducournau - born 9 December 1979 in Caracas -Jose Luis Graterol - born 27 September 1981 in Caracas -Marcos Causa - born 12 September 1981 in Caracas -luis ricardo - born 22 noviembre 1985 in Mexico ==Discography== ===Albums=== *''[[Ya lo Ves]]'' (Now You See) Tracklist: #Brujeria #Creo en ti #Ya lo ves #Con él #Una piedra en el zapato #Viviendo sin ti #Mira no #Creo que te amo #Tarde o temprano #Si te vas #Inolvidable #You are the one *''[[Uff!oria Latina]]'' (Latin Euphoria, Uff! used instead of Euph) Tracklist: #Cada recuerdo #Chicas #Twist #Arrivederci #Como nadie #Ángel del mal #Dame #Canción de amor #Más que un sentimiento #Tal vez #Déjame entrar #Agua salada #De norte a sur *''[[a 10 centimetros]]'' (to ten centimeters) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *http://cluboficialconuff.galeon.com/ (In [[Spanish language|Spanish]]) [[Category:Venezuelan boy bands]] [[Category:Musical groups established in the 1990s]]
